All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AI
AI - AI opponent which is derived from Player
Bag
Represents a Bag for storing and managing items in the game.
BattleSolo
BattleSolo - Manages a solo battle between two Minymphs.
ConcretePlayer
ConcretePlayer - Concrete player which is derived from Player.
Enemy
Enemy - Enemy opponent which is derived from Player
GUI
GUI - Class for the user interface of a Minymph battle game.
Main
Entry point for the minymph-style battle game.
Minymph
Represents a Minymph character with various attributes, abilities, and status.
Moves
Represents a move in the Minymph game with attributes such as name, damage, PP (Power Points), critical rate, and any potential side effect.
Objects
Represents an in-game object with attributes such as name, type, HP (health points), unique identifier, side effects, and the player affected by the object.
Player
Represents a player in the game with a name and a currently selected Minymph.
Shop
Represents a shop in the game where players can purchase items or upgrades using in-game currency.
TypeMinymph
Represents the type of a Minymph character, with possible types being "grass," "fire," "water," and "wind".
